title: bAlakrSNan
sahitya:
bAlakrSNan pAdamalar paNivOrkkiDarilai vara guNa 


anupallavi

  nIla mukhil pOl azhagan
 			(madhyama kAlam)
niraimati vadanam adanil iLa nagai nilavaruLoLi tavazhum


caraNam    gOkulam brndAvanam yamunA vihArI gOpAlan
gOpI jana mana mOhana muraLI gAna vilOlan
vyAkulam tavirttanbar manadil vAzh karuNAla vAlan
 			(madhyama kAlam)
mazhai taDukka gOvarddha malai eDutta tiNDOLan
pizhai poruttaruL dayALan bhraman paNi malart-tALan
